en: Human life has dignity because it reflects God.
God gives people purpose, responsibility, and blessing.

lines: God created humans in His image—male and female.
God blessed them and gave them a calling.
They were to care for the earth as stewards.

label.en: A World Given as a Gift

lines: God saw what He made and called it very good.
Life is not an accident—God intended it.

question.en: What does it mean to live as someone made in God’s image?
